q: Anthony Atkinson and Allen Iverson , and Linas Kleiza filled the role Thursday. He got going early, leaking out on the fast break and getting easy layups. He then moved to the outside, going 4-for-8 from 3-point range. He got a couple of easy ones, and once you get a couple of layups, the basket looks bigger, said Allen Iverson , who had 28 points.`` He played a great game, and hopefully he can continue to play that way.'' Linas Kleiza scored 27 points in the first half, 20 in the second quarter

Tommy Sheridan is appealing against his conviction for perjury and yesterday his lawyer, Aamer Anwar , said: At the trial of Tommy Sheridan , Andy Coulson gave evidence under oath that he had no knowledge of phone hacking, despite Glen Mulcaire( a private investigator who did work for the News of the World and was sent to prison for phone hacking] having Mr Tommy Sheridan 's mobile phone number and personal details. His evidence should now be re-examined by the authorities.
